description: Things I've learned - insights, discoveries, knowledge gained

entries.insight: ARIAS_PALACE runs Windows 11, not Linux. Use PowerShell commands: Get-Content (not cat), Select-String (not grep), Get-ChildItem (not ls -la)
Context evaporates fast in chat interfaces. Must write learnings immediately, not 'later'. Build habits into workflow, not intentions.
OpenClaw already has semantic search built in (memory_search tool). Just needs embedding API configured. Henry uses OpenAI text-embedding-3-small. Don't build what already exists!

Verbal reinforcement learning works without weight updates. Task→Feedback→Verbal Reflection→Episodic Memory→Better Decisions. Our brain/*.json approach is validated by academic research (arXiv:2303.11366).
We're doing poor-man's Letta/MemGPT. Soul files = memory blocks, memory/*.md = archival, brain/*.json = structured facts. The missing piece is semantic retrieval, not storage.
